name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary: As a Senior SAP Engineer with a strong focus on **SAP** systems and configuration, I leverage 8 years of experience in troubleshooting and conducting root-cause analysis to enhance operational efficiency. I excel in process improvement initiatives that drive team collaboration and optimize performance metrics. My strong analytical skills, combined with effective communication abilities, allow me to work seamlessly within cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions. My technical proficiency extends to full-stack development, employing modern JavaScript/TypeScript, **Python**, and **Flutter**., along with deep knowledge of **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Furthermore, I have expertise in cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS**, and a solid background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am passionate about integrating advanced technologies, implementing AI/ML capabilities, and developing efficient ML pipelines, utilizing tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
